GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10.110 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
mm,hwpoison: unmap poisoned page before invalidation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit bc2f58b8e47cc01cb75e13e29930e4e547d6bc5c, it was introduced in version v5.10.110 by commit fa37c1714367e530f592d451607433ab58d56643. For more details please see the references link.
